welcome_message_body: Welcome to Flitwick, a charming town known for its beautiful countryside and friendly locals. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring all that our town has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at Luton Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is a smaller terminal at Luton Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free for the first 4 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northampton Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Northampton Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights at London Elstree Aerodrome.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Royal Air Force Alconbury Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Royal Air Force Alconbury Airport is used exclusively by military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
